name: The Void Project
storyline: The Void Project is a 90s-inspired FPS game with a unique art style. Instead of endless hordes of demons, the timer is you should worry about more. Complete waves and defeat demons as fast as possible to climb the leaderboard. With swift movement and powerful weapons, let's see how far you can go.
summary: The Void Project is a fast paced arena shooter that throws you into an arena simulation. Face different kind of demons, overcome their patterns and finish them off in as less time as possible to reach the top of the leaderboard and make yourself worthy of calling ~The Void Breaker~.
